text: Ashwani Kumar (15 November 1950 - 7 October 2020) was an IPS officer and politician. He was Governor of the Indian state of Nagaland, and for a short time Governor of Manipur during 2013. He was the DGP of Himachal Pradesh from August 2006 to July 2008 and was the Director of CBI between 2 August 2008 and 30 November 2010. Kumar committed suicide by hanging himself at his home in Shimla, Himachal Pradesh on 7 October 2020, aged 69. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides by hanging Category:Police officers Category:Governors of Manipur Category:Governors of Nagaland
title: Ashwani Kumar (police officer)
